title: DailyBrief
description: Schema describing a concise daily summary of key updates, priorities, and events. All content must be factual, concise, and avoid hallucinations or unsupported information.

date.description: The date the daily brief covers (ISO 8601 format). Must be accurate and not fabricated.

summary.description: High-level overview of the dayâ€™s key themes and developments. Avoid speculation and ensure all information is verifiable.

top_updates.description: List of the most important updates for the day. Only include updates that are confirmed and factual.

priorities.description: List of priority tasks or goals for the day. Do not include tasks that are speculative or unsupported.

task.description: Description of the priority item. Must be based on actual plans or assignments.

events.description: Notable meetings, deadlines, or other scheduled events. Only include events that are scheduled and confirmed.

time.description: Time of the event (HH:MM, 24-hour format). Must be accurate and not fabricated.

description.description: Brief description of the event. Avoid hallucinated or speculative events.

risks.description: Potential risks or issues to monitor today. Only include risks that are substantiated and relevant.

notes.description: Additional context, reminders, or observations. Do not include hallucinated, speculative, or unsupported information.
